originalText.text: The best!  Dr. Fochios is always attentive, thorough, and kind. His personal manner is reassuring beyond measure.

text.text: The best!  Dr. Fochios is always attentive, thorough, and kind. His personal manner is reassuring beyond measure.

originalText.text: Dr Fochios is focused on wellbeing and the bigger picture rather than just prescribing drugs. He is extremely well connected and urgent appointments with specialists are prompt.  Always professional and empathetic.

text.text: Dr Fochios is focused on wellbeing and the bigger picture rather than just prescribing drugs. He is extremely well connected and urgent appointments with specialists are prompt.  Always professional and empathetic.

originalText.text: Best doctor in NYC and one of the best in the country. Excellent diagnosis ability and terrific procedure outcomes. Steve is also one of the kindest people you will ever meet. Wonderful bedside manner too. I wouldn't go to anyone else.

text.text: Best doctor in NYC and one of the best in the country. Excellent diagnosis ability and terrific procedure outcomes. Steve is also one of the kindest people you will ever meet. Wonderful bedside manner too. I wouldn't go to anyone else.

originalText.text: Dr. Fochios is absolutely wonderful!  He was referred to me by my brother who was referred by a close friend of his, and I'm so grateful to have found him. He's the best doctor I've ever had.

text.text: Dr. Fochios is absolutely wonderful!  He was referred to me by my brother who was referred by a close friend of his, and I'm so grateful to have found him. He's the best doctor I've ever had.

originalText.text: Dr Fochios is kind, caring and VERY knowledgeable. Also incredibly responsive. I am so please to have him as our family provider.

text.text: Dr Fochios is kind, caring and VERY knowledgeable. Also incredibly responsive. I am so please to have him as our family provider.
